mapper.update: update l_individual set individualid=individualid ,individualcode=#{individualcode} ,name=#{name} ,idcard=#{idcard} ,gender=#{gender} ,nation=#{nation} ,bornday=#{bornday} ,certorg=#{certorg} ,icon=#{icon} ,effdate=#{effdate} ,expdate=#{expdate} ,wechat=#{wechat} ,alipay=#{alipay} ,address=#{address} ,phone=#{phone} ,trucktype=#{trucktype} ,trucknum=#{trucknum} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} ,createtime=#{createtime} ,deleteflag=#{deleteflag} where individualid=#{individualid}

update l_individual set individualid=individualid ,individualcode=#{individualcode} ,name=#{name} ,idcard=#{idcard} ,gender=#{gender} ,nation=#{nation} ,bornday=#{bornday} ,certorg=#{certorg} ,icon=#{icon} ,effdate=#{effdate} ,expdate=#{expdate} ,wechat=#{wechat} ,alipay=#{alipay} ,address=#{address} ,phone=#{phone} ,trucktype=#{trucktype} ,trucknum=#{trucknum} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} ,createtime=#{createtime} ,deleteflag=#{deleteflag} where 1=1 and individualid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and individualid =#{Where_Id} and individualid=#{Where_individualid} and individualcode=#{Where_individualcode} and name=#{Where_name} and idcard=#{Where_idcard} and gender=#{Where_gender} and nation=#{Where_nation} and bornday=#{Where_bornday} and certorg=#{Where_certorg} and icon=#{Where_icon} and effdate=#{Where_effdate} and expdate=#{Where_expdate} and wechat=#{Where_wechat} and alipay=#{Where_alipay} and address=#{Where_address} and phone=#{Where_phone} and trucktype=#{Where_trucktype} and trucknum=#{Where_trucknum} and createuserid=#{Where_createuserid} and createtime=#{Where_createtime} and deleteflag=#{Where_deleteflag}
mapper.select: select t.individualid "individualid", t.individualcode "individualcode", t.name "name", t.idcard "idcard", t.gender "gender", t.nation "nation", t.bornday "bornday", t.certorg "certorg", t.icon "icon", t.effdate "effdate", t.expdate "expdate", t.wechat "wechat", t.alipay "alipay", t.address "address", t.phone "phone", t.trucktype "trucktype", t.trucknum "trucknum", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime", t.deleteflag "deleteflag" from l_individual t where individualid=#{individualid}

select t.individualid "individualid", t.individualcode "individualcode", t.name "name", t.idcard "idcard", t.gender "gender", t.nation "nation", t.bornday "bornday", t.certorg "certorg", t.icon "icon", t.effdate "effdate", t.expdate "expdate", t.wechat "wechat", t.alipay "alipay", t.address "address", t.phone "phone", t.trucktype "trucktype", t.trucknum "trucknum", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime", t.deleteflag "deleteflag" from l_individual t where 1=1 and t.individualid=#{individualid} and t.individualcode=#{individualcode} and t.name=#{name} and t.idcard=#{idcard} and t.gender=#{gender} and t.nation=#{nation} and t.bornday=#{bornday} and t.certorg=#{certorg} and t.icon=#{icon} and t.effdate=#{effdate} and t.expdate=#{expdate} and t.wechat=#{wechat} and t.alipay=#{alipay} and t.address=#{address} and t.phone=#{phone} and t.trucktype=#{trucktype} and t.trucknum=#{trucknum} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.deleteflag=#{deleteflag}

select t.individualid "individualid", t.individualcode "individualcode", t.name "name", t.idcard "idcard", t.gender "gender", t.nation "nation", t.bornday "bornday", t.certorg "certorg", t.icon "icon", t.effdate "effdate", t.expdate "expdate", t.wechat "wechat", t.alipay "alipay", t.address "address", t.phone "phone", t.trucktype "trucktype", t.trucknum "trucknum", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime", t.deleteflag "deleteflag" from l_individual t where 1=1 and t.individualid=#{individualid} and t.individualcode=#{individualcode} and t.name=#{name} and t.idcard=#{idcard} and t.gender=#{gender} and t.nation=#{nation} and t.bornday=#{bornday} and t.certorg=#{certorg} and t.icon=#{icon} and t.effdate=#{effdate} and t.expdate=#{expdate} and t.wechat=#{wechat} and t.alipay=#{alipay} and t.address=#{address} and t.phone=#{phone} and t.trucktype=#{trucktype} and t.trucknum=#{trucknum} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.deleteflag=#{deleteflag}
mapper.delete: delete from l_individual where 1=1 and individualid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and individualid =#{Where_Id} and individualid=#{Where_individualid} and individualcode=#{Where_individualcode} and name=#{Where_name} and idcard=#{Where_idcard} and gender=#{Where_gender} and nation=#{Where_nation} and bornday=#{Where_bornday} and certorg=#{Where_certorg} and icon=#{Where_icon} and effdate=#{Where_effdate} and expdate=#{Where_expdate} and wechat=#{Where_wechat} and alipay=#{Where_alipay} and address=#{Where_address} and phone=#{Where_phone} and trucktype=#{Where_trucktype} and trucknum=#{Where_trucknum} and createuserid=#{Where_createuserid} and createtime=#{Where_createtime} and deleteflag=#{Where_deleteflag}
mapper.select: select t.individualid "individualid", t.individualcode "individualcode", t.name "name", t.idcard "idcard", t.gender "gender", t.nation "nation", t.bornday "bornday", t.certorg "certorg", t.icon "icon", t.effdate "effdate", t.expdate "expdate", t.wechat "wechat", t.alipay "alipay", t.address "address", t.phone "phone", t.trucktype "trucktype", t.trucknum "trucknum", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime", t.deleteflag "deleteflag" from l_individual t where 1=1 and t.individualid=#{individualid} and t.individualcode=#{individualcode} and t.name=#{name} and t.idcard=#{idcard} and t.gender=#{gender} and t.nation=#{nation} and t.bornday=#{bornday} and t.certorg=#{certorg} and t.icon=#{icon} and t.effdate=#{effdate} and t.expdate=#{expdate} and t.wechat=#{wechat} and t.alipay=#{alipay} and t.address=#{address} and t.phone=#{phone} and t.trucktype=#{trucktype} and t.trucknum=#{trucknum} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.deleteflag=#{deleteflag}

select count(*) from l_individual t where 1=1 and t.individualid=#{individualid} and t.individualid!=#{NoId} and t.individualcode=#{individualcode} and t.name=#{name} and t.idcard=#{idcard} and t.gender=#{gender} and t.nation=#{nation} and t.bornday=#{bornday} and t.certorg=#{certorg} and t.icon=#{icon} and t.effdate=#{effdate} and t.expdate=#{expdate} and t.wechat=#{wechat} and t.alipay=#{alipay} and t.address=#{address} and t.phone=#{phone} and t.trucktype=#{trucktype} and t.trucknum=#{trucknum} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime} and t.deleteflag=#{deleteflag}
select count(*) from l_individual where 1=1 and idcard=#{idcard}
mapper.update: update l_individual set individualid=individualid ,name=#{name} ,idcard=#{idcard} ,address=#{address} ,phone=#{phone} ,trucktype=#{trucktype} ,trucknum=#{trucknum} where idcard=#{idcard}
mapper.select: select * from l_individual where 1=1 and name like #{name}
